ISSUE.TITLE: Can't import repository from GitHub
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Hi team, trying to import a Spring Petclinic repo (https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-petclinic.git) in Gitness and no luck. This query fails with HTTP 400: http://localhost:3000/api/v1/repos/import Request: `{"description":"","parent_ref":"spring-petclinic","uid":"spring-petclinic.git","provider":{"type":"github","username":"","password":""},"provider_repo":"spring-projects/spring-petclinic.git"}` Video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=v4x6G4BwxhA
